title: 快来看看啊~ 原版TNT模组！！！！
author: TC_XR
txt_content:
本帖最后由 TC_XR 于 2015-11-27 19:43 编辑 

本人第一次发帖~请大家支持~{:10_512:}
下面是介绍：
截图吧：





这是指令生成的时候





生成完毕~
接下来就是一些TNT的命名（因为我的模组就是要命名~）：














更多图片：
























指令:/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Tile:152,Time:10,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~-39 ~1 ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~2 ~-17 ~5 ~2 ~-5 end_stone"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~9 ~-17 ~ ~4 ~-5 stained_glass"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~5 ~10 ~-17 ~5 ~4 ~-5 stained_glass"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~4 ~6 ~-5 ~1 ~11 ~-5 stained_glass"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~13 ~-17 ~5 ~13 ~-5 end_stone"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~1 ~13 ~-17 ~4 ~8 ~-17 stained_glass"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~2 ~10 ~-16 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~1 ~11 ~-16 command_block 0 replace {Command:summon FallingSand ~1 ~ ~ {Time:0,TileID:152}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~3 ~12 ~-16 command_block 0 replace {Command:execute @e[type=PigZombie,name=blasting] ~ ~ ~ /summon PrimedTnt ~ ~ ~}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~2 ~13 ~-15 command_block 0 replace {Command:execute @e[type=PigZombie,name=blasting] ~ ~ ~ /summon PrimedTnt ~-1 ~ ~-1}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~1 ~14 ~-14 command_block 0 replace {Command:summon FallingSand ~1 ~ ~ {Time:0,TileID:152}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~2 ~15 ~-14 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~3 ~16 ~-14 command_block 0 replace {Command:execute @e[type=PigZombie,name=lava] ~ ~ ~ /fill ~-2 ~-1 ~2 ~2 ~ ~ lava}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~2 ~17 ~-13 command_block 0 replace {Command:kill @e[type=PigZombie,name=lava]}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~2 ~19 ~-14 command_block 0 replace {Command:execute @e[type=PigZombie,name=lava] ~ ~ ~ /summon PrimedTnt ~ ~ ~}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~1 ~19 ~-12 command_block 0 replace {Command:summon FallingSand ~1 ~ ~ {Time:0,TileID:152}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~2 ~20 ~-12 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~2 ~22 ~-12 command_block 0 replace {Command:execute @e[type=PigZombie,name=anvil] ~ ~ ~ /fill ~-4 ~21 ~2 ~4 ~21 ~-2 anvil}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~3 ~22 ~-12 command_block 0 replace {Command:effect @e[type=PigZombie,name=anvil] 6 1 3}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~2 ~23 ~-11 command_block 0 replace {Command:execute @e[type=PigZombie,name=anvil] ~ ~ ~ /summon PrimedTnt ~ ~ ~}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~1 ~24 ~-10 command_block 0 replace {Command:summon FallingSand ~1 ~ ~ {Time:0,TileID:152}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~2 ~25 ~-10 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~2 ~27 ~-10 command_block 0 replace {Command:execute @e[type=PigZombie,name=LightningBolt] ~ ~ ~ /summon LightningBolt ~ ~ ~}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~3 ~27 ~-10 command_block 0 replace {Command:execute @e[type=PigZombie,name=LightningBolt] ~ ~ ~ /summon PrimedTnt ~ ~ ~}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~2 ~28 ~-9 command_block 0 replace {Command:execute @e[type=PigZombie,name=bacteria] ~ ~ ~ effect @e[r=6] 19 20 1}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~1 ~29 ~-8 command_block 0 replace {Command:summon FallingSand ~1 ~ ~ {Time:0,TileID:152}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~2 ~30 ~-8 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~2 ~32 ~-8 command_block 0 replace {Command:execute @e[type=PigZombie,name=bacteria] ~ ~ ~ /particle slime ~ ~ ~ 2 2 2 3 10000}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~2 ~32 ~-7 command_block 0 replace {Command:effect @e[type=PigZombie,name=bacteria] 6 1 3}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~4 ~35 ~-6 ~1 ~35 ~-16 end_stone"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~2 ~37 ~-14 command_block 0 replace {Command:effect @e[type=PigZombie,name=blasting] 14 100000 255}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~3 ~39 ~-14 command_block 0 replace {Command:effect @e[type=PigZombie,name=lava] 14 100000 255}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~1 ~40 ~-14 command_block 0 replace {Command:summon FallingSand ~1 ~ ~ {Time:0,TileID:152}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~2 ~41 ~-14 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~ ~39 ~ command_block 0 replace {Command:fill ~ ~ ~ ~ ~-42 ~1 air}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~ ~39 ~1 stone"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~ ~42 ~1 {Time:1,TileID:152}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"say 使用方法！ 如下：把猪人蛋命名成：blasting,使用可以爆炸！ == 命名成lava,使用可以破坏脚下方块！并且爆炸出熔浆！ == 命名成anvil,使用可以爆炸，然后从天而降铁砧！ == 命名成LightningBolt,使用可以爆炸出闪电！ == 命名成：bacteria,使用可以向周围发散细菌使其中毒(只能使会中毒的生物中毒！)"}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}
使用方法指令里有~
如果不行：请看度娘：这里~  提取码：cmv9   


最后~请大家支持~ 求人气、金粒~！！！！
